newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portuguese shares seen higher with foreign trend.
newsitem.headline: Portuguese shares seen higher with foreign trend.

text.p: 0825 GMT - Lisbon shares seen higher after the positive close of Wall Street and the firmer opening of some European bourses, although a cooling of the dollar could weigh on stocks that are most exposed to foreign investors. News that construction groups Engil and Edifer are joining forces to form a new "economic group" could push Engil shares higher again, dealers said. Edifer is not listed. U.S. indicators such as jobless claims could affect liquidity.
